features: 【HD Dash Cam Front and Rear】Our dash cam have 1080P HD front camera lens and 720P waterproof rear camera, the front camera has 6 HD lenses, F2.0 large aperture, 12MP pixel CMOS sensor, with super WDR and photo anti-shake, can clearly record the road signs and license plates outside the car, enough to record all kinds of unexpected situations.

【Ultra-Wide Angle & IPS Screen】The front car camera has an ultra-wide 170 ° wide angle, you can shoot a wider picture, reduce the video recording blind spot, easy to record the side to the collision situation, at the same time, The dashcam also has a large 2.45-inch IPS HD screen, which can playback video and does not affect the line of sight while driving through the screen saver technology.

【Multi-functional Monitoring Protection】When your car is accidentally hit by the G-Sensor Lock function, it will help you lock the video taken during this time to keep evidence for providing proof video; Parking Monitor can provide 24-hour guard for your car (but you need to buy an additional hardware kit), in addition we provide Motion Detection, Audio Recording, Taking Photos, Time Stamp, etc.

【Infinite Loop Recording】 Our dash camera for cars has an infinite loop recording function, the car recorder can be in the memory card storage full, through the loop recording, you can still record the latest video, while we also give the dash cam front and rear equipped with a 32GB memory card, you can meet your daily use.

【Easy to Install & Super After-sales Service】We provide 2 easy ways to install the front camera with suction cup and paste, you can also ask us if you encounter problems during installation, and we will provide 2 years warranty for all customers who buy our dash cam, and provide 24-hour customer service, you can contact us, we will promptly for you We will solve it in time.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: 1080P Full HD Dash Cam Front and Rear with 32GB SD Card

What can Pumpa Dashcam bring to you? -Reliable Helper: Pumpa dash cam is committed to providing reliable help to all drivers, when an accident occurs, the evidence can be viewed on the spot through playback, so that the party at fault can not be defended, saving the trouble of litigation and billing costs Pumpa Dash Cam Front and Rear The car camera front can be reoriented 360° in any direction.The rear camera can be waterproof, 2 types of installation.IPS screen supports video and photo viewing on dash cam. 1080P FHD Front Camera, 170° Super Wide Angle 720P Waterproof Rear Camera, 140° Wide Angle 32GB memory card included Operating Temperature : 14°F~122°F Multi-Language Support (English/Spanish/Chinese/Deutsh/ French/Italian/Japanese) Support Video, Photo and Audio Recording and Playback

1080P FHD Front Camera Our 1080P FHD dash cam front consists of 6 HD lens, and a 12MP CMOS sensor, with our WDR and photo anti-shake, which can clearly record the road conditions. 720P Waterproof Rear Camera Our rear car camera has 720P waterproof camera, can protect the camera will not be rain interference, while the rear camera supports fixed installation and paste installation. High Quality 32GB SD Card We provide each customer with a 32GB memory card with the specifications U1 and V10 so that it can be used quickly and directly after receiving the dash cam, without the need to purchase additional memory cards.

Loop Recording & Accident Lock With Loop Recording, you can keep the dashcam continuously recording without worrying about the SD card storage being full. When the G-sensor senses a collision, Accident Lock can help you lock the video during this time to keep evidence for a possible car accident. Super Wide Field of View The dash camera front has a 170° super wide angle lens, the rear camera has a 140° wide angle, will be recorded as far as possible to the side of the incoming traffic, but also will be a good helper to record the scenery along your road trip. Parking Monitor When you intend to leave the car, after turning on Parking Monitor, dashcam will still record the situation outside the car for you when there is an accident (Note: To achieve 24-hour continuous monitoring of this feature, you need to purchase an additional hardware kit).
NOTE: Please format the memory card first when you use it for the first time.Before installing the dash cam front and rear, please wipe the window position to be installed and paste it firmly.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 3, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars For forty bucks, I don’t think you can beat this dashcam set.
reviews.reviewText: Review of Dash Cam Front and Rear, 1080P Full HD Dash Camera for Cars with 32GB SD Card, 2.45'' IPS Screen, 170°Wide Angle, Night Vision, Parking Monitor, Loop Recording, Motion DetectionA few months ago, I was at a stoplight, in a turn lane, with a large work truck in front of me and a car behind me. The driver of the truck decided that he wanted to go to the next turnoff instead, so he throws it in reverse and hits the gas. He backed into me hard enough to total my little 1991 Ford Escort. Fortunately, he was honest enough to not take off and admitted to what he had done. Had he not been, I would have been left sitting there or trying to prove that I did not run into him while he was stopped. Most people that are not involved in an accident won’t bother to stop and provide a witness statement either anymore. So, I decided to get a dashcam for both of my vehicles.This had good reviews overall. It is not an expensive dashcam and it has a rear camera too. It comes with a 32GB SD card, and with the loop recording, it is sufficient to do the job. This thing is pretty small, but it does not obstruct your view and is easily mounted out of the way, plus has very little weight to it. It comes with 2 ways to mount it on the front windshield, a suction cup (my preferred since I don’t like to adhere things to parts of my car with 3M) and 3M tape. The suction cup worked well and has a little dial to turn to the right to finish the suction. I note this because I did not notice this at first and wondered why it was not suctioning all the way. Also provided are some (3 or 4) cable retainers with 3M backing, and I used 1 of these to keep the rear camera cable up near the top of the front windshield where it feeds into the front camera.There is no phone app. The User Interface is all on the front camera and is not overly complicated with a little fidgeting. The camera is easy to position and tighten down. The rear camera is easily mounted too. I found it somewhat difficult to ensure that the rear camera was plugged in all the way, both into the front camera and at the joining of the cables for the rear camera. The power cable is ample, but I plan to use a fused hardwire kit so that I can utilize the parked feature. The resolution (front 1080P HD front, 720HP rear) is sufficient for my uses in this, my work vehicle that replaced my totaled one. The rear is rated waterproof. The field of vision is sufficient.The rear camera cable is long enough for smaller cars with some left over probably. I put this in a 2002 Ford Taurus SEL. I saw where some people put the rear cameras on the outsides of their vehicles, under a spoiler, or even near the license plate. Even if I ran the cable just onto the floor down the middle of the vehicle, it would not be long enough to get to the rear of my vehicle onto the spoiler or license plate. I did hide the cable along the right side of the inside of my vehicle, from top to bottom, and then along the right-side bottom back up to the rear windshield.The screen on the camera is small enough that I really can’t see it being of much use as a backup camera, especially if it is in split-screen mode. It does not sense backup movement and does not switch modes automatically either. It has a screensaver function, and it can be set to off, or timed to a couple of short modes. I opted to utilize this function and have it set to 30 seconds.For the price, and the features and resolutions, this camera is great. I will strive to update this review with anything relevant. For forty bucks, this is a hard deal to beat.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 5, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great camera with affordable price
reviews.reviewText: I've been using another cam for 2 yrs and it was dead. This is a replacement for old one. I was hesitating to buy it at first due to price. I paid $150 for old one but this is a lot less than that. I was curious about quality. But I made my decision and gave it a shot. What a surprise!! It even came with rear cam and micro SD. Set up was super easy and everything was well organized in a box. Tricky part is hiding all wires all the way to backside. But it took me less than 30 min to install neat and clean and turn it on right away when engine starts. Menu is easy and picture quality is great. It is working as same as my old $150 cam. It's a steal with this much of price and quality. I had a car accident before, and my dash cam recorded everything. I submitted my recording and insurance company accepted other's fault right away with it. Recording can be legal proof for accident. I hope that kind thing never happens again, but you'll never know. This is a must to have in your car all the time.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 11, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Quick Easy Set Up
reviews.reviewText: Took me 30 minutes to fully set up and tuck all the wires, I didn’t even need to read directions it was so simple. The camera quality isnt the best but it does the job, at night time it isn’t any better. On the plus side you can sey the time duration to 1 2 or 5 minutes I believe it was. I was super happy to find out it can sense a hit if the cars off and it’ll start recording!!! Definitely worth the price in my opinion

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 9, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good bang for your buck
reviews.reviewText: This is a wired dash cam. The wires are long enough to be hidden in the car without straining or pulling on the camera. When reversing the dash cam can serve as a back up camera if your car lacks one. It is easy to operate and set up. I’ve had it for about 2 months now, and I have not had any issues with it. The rain does not impact the rear cam or it’s wiring. I have the wires running outside my car for the rear cam hidden in the trim. It comes with two ways to set up the front dash cam. I used the 3m method and it has stayed in place without issue. It is very easy to lock in video footage while driving. It is just a single click on the cam. The video quality is good. I think this is a good deal as it is an affordable camera. I would purchase from this company again.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 2, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great Dash Cam for the value
reviews.reviewText: Attached this to my car and have absolutely no issues with it. The camera quality is great for both the front and back cameras and the control menu is intuitive and easy to use. It comes with a 32gb memory card that's pre-formatted and it worked straight out of the box for me. It also has little adhesive wire holders to keep the wires from blocking anything important, which I really appreciated. The adhesive holds up really well on those too, I did a 14 hour road trip with the sun hitting the adhesive the whole time and the wires didn't fall down. You're getting a great product for your money's worth with this dash cam. I would definitely recommend it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 2, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Really good dash cam for people who don't wanna break the bank
reviews.reviewText: When I first bought this, I was quite skeptical about how the quality was and other things. But when I used it, I can't express how thrilled I am with this incredible device. It has truly been a game-changer for my daily driving experience, and I want to share my positive thoughts about it. Setting up the dash cam was a breeze. The user-friendly interface and clear instructions made it a hassle-free experience. I appreciate how it seamlessly integrates into my daily routine. It is a wire dashcam, however, it's super easy to hide and its long enough to connect the back camera and the front camera. The record quality is really good and even at night, the quality is still really good.In summary, I can confidently say that this dash cam has been a fantastic addition to my daily commute. It offers peace of mind, enhances my safety on the road, and provides valuable evidence in case of unforeseen incidents. I highly recommend it to anyone looking for a reliable and feature-packed dash cam. It's an investment that I'm extremely satisfied with, and I can't imagine driving without it now!

This product was easy to set up, works well, great quality, clarity of picture was really good, perfect to record driving during the day and even good at night time. Would definitely buy again from this seller- product recommended!

For the price you can’t go wrong, records well and capture everything not as advance as my other dash cam but basic enough and good enough quality to be used in my dads everyday car. The camera has good quality during the day and decent quality in the night. It comes with a rear recording camera which is great and has a parking shock sensor that will record for a couple of seconds If it detects and impact when car is parked. You can view recordings through camera screen or take out SD card and see recording files on laptop which it comes with,Overall good for the price
I fitted my cameras as described, it works very well, turns on when I start my car, nice to have a bit of reassurance and security

Worked well for six weeks then completely stopped working. Just turned off and won’t turn back on, doesn’t recognize a charge. Just completely stopped working, nothing I can do. Absolute garbage. Don’t buy.
